resources.string: You have found all sets.\nWould you like to start new game?

The player have to find all sets amongst twelve displayed cards.
 Each card has four features: color, shape, quantity and fulfillment. Set consists of three cards which satisfy all of the following conditions:
 * they all have the same number, or they have three different numbers
 * they all have the same symbol, or they have three different symbols
 * they all have the same shading, or they have three different shadings
 * they all have the same color, or they have three different colors
Two cards have the same color but third one has different
Two cards have the same quantity but third one has different
Two cards have the same shape but third one has different
Two cards have the same fulfillment but third one has different
You have already found all sets
